attributes.action: Enact Constitutional Convention by allowing the King the opportunity to do so.
attributes.additional_details: The Labour Party have crossed the line in terms of misleading the nation during elections, and have since continually broken promises that have cost this country dearly.
attributes.background: Force the government to allow the King to have the opportunity on behalf of the nation to dissolve the current government, on the basis of continued lack of confidence of the Labour government.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
